All Classes
 

Documentation for classes includes syntax, usage information, and code samples for methods, properties, and event handlers and listeners for those APIs that belong to a specific class in ActionScript. The classes are listed alphabetically. If you are not sure to which class a certain method or property belongs, you can look it up in the Index.


 ClassPackageDescription
 EncryptedModuleLoader
com.nitrolm.modules.spark EncryptedModuleLoader is a component that behaves much like a SWFLoader except that it follows a contract with the loaded content.
 EncryptedModuleManager
com.nitrolm.modules.spark The EncryptedModuleManager class centrally manages dynamically loaded encrypted modules.
 LicenseClient
com.nitrolm LicenseClient is the main class used for communicating to Nitro-LM Servers
 LicenseClientEvent
com.nitrolm The LicenseClientEvent is used to send response codes and data from the NitroLM server.
 Login
com.nitrolm.comp A Skinnable login component.
 LoginSkin
com.nitrolm.comp.skins 
 Map
com.nitrolm.data Simple implementation of a HashMap.
 NLMConstants
com.nitrolm This class holds constants describing request, response, and custom value types
